section.draft-comment: Applicability: All devices supporting 902-928MHz or WLAN, or wireless devices that use detachable antenna(e)
Applicability: All wireless devices supporting 902 - 928 MHz, 2.4GHz or 5GHz bands

Translation: The operation of this device is subject to the following two conditions: (1) this equipment or device must not cause harmful interference and (2) this equipment or device must accept any interference, including interference which could otherwise cause its undesired operation.
section.p: La operación de este equipo está sujeta a las siguientes dos condiciones: (1) es posible que este equipo o dispositivo no cause interferencia perjudicial y (2) este equipo o dispositivo debe aceptar cualquier interferencia, incluyendo la que pueda causar su operación no deseada.

section.draft-comment:
Applicability: For products with detachable antennas:
Note to Reg Lead: Add [x] – gain and [y] impedance from test report or specifications.

Translation: This equipment has been designed to operate with the antennas that are listed immediately and with a maximum antenna gain in [X] dB. Using antennas not included in this list or having a gain greater than [X] dB is prohibited. The impedance of the antenna required is [Y] ohms
section.p: Este equipo ha sido diseñado para operar con las antenas que enseguida se enlistan y para una ganancia máxima de antena de dB. El uso con este equipo de antenas no incluidas en esta lista o que tengan una ganancia mayor que dB quedan prohibidas. La impedancia requerida de la antena es de ohms.
